revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Wepear |image = [[File:Wepear.png]] |caption = The potent mix of bitter and sour in this Berry seems to promote digestion. The flower is white and beautiful. |growtime = 6m 40s |harvest = 12 berries |replant = 40% |points = 30 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Wepear''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Rawst]] and at least 1 [[Oran]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Harvest Stages durations ! !! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 0-150s || 150-350s || 350-375s || 375-400s || 400-800s |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:WepearTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:WepearTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:WepearTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Wepear berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || || || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || || || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || |- | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || || || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] |}
